column4: what device is my parallel port? I'm trying to get xsane to find my scanner
do you know much about xsane
what do you need to know?
xsane plustek_pp:/dev/parport0 should find my scanner, but it gets an i/o error
by default it finds my TV card and "scans' from that
only shows you the tv card?
k.. that means your scanner was not detected and is not loaded... you need to probably download some modules or drivers for it
after plugging it in, what do the last two lines of dmesg saay?
I would believe that. I do I find them
plugging it in? It parallel port.
type dmesg and tell me what it says
plugging in the scanner? The last two lines are Bluetooth and ibm_acpi
sorry I have to go now, thanks for the help though. I'll try again later
